text: Muhammad Arie Irawan Ahmad Fauzi (21 August 1990 â€“ 7 April 2019) was a Malaysian professional golfer. He was born in Selangor, Malaysia. Irawan played on the Asian Tour, the Asian Development Tour and the PGA Tour China. He won two events on the Asian Development Tour in early 2015. On 7 April 2019, Irawan was found dead at his hotel in Sanya, China at the age of 28. The cause of death is unknown though many believe it to be natural. ==References== Category:1990 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Malaysian sportspeople Category:Golfers Category:People from Selangor
title: Arie Irawan
